casebody.data:
STATE
v.
Scotty ROACH. No. 366P08. Supreme Court of North Carolina. October 9, 2008. Robert Montgomery, Special Deputy Attorney General, R. Stuart Albright, District Attorney, for State of NC.

The following order has been entered on the motion filed on the 7th day of August 2008 by Defendant to Appeal Order Denying Motion for Reconsideration Request to Correct the Record:

"Motion Dismissed by order of the Court in conference this the 9th day of October 2008."
